name: Alpha Switch
description:
One of my projects I have worked on for my Games Proposal at UClan (University of Central Lancashire) set in a future where humanity has reached the stars. 

You are tasked with dealing with rouge bots in a residential sky platform. Luckily, you are the pilot of a craft that has the ability to change its form in order use different abilities. Using these abilities is the key to navigating and destroying the rouge bots and saving the platform.

UCLan Games Design course: HOME - University of Central Lancashire Games Design Course (gamescourse.co.uk)
